hey, its tom, i dont know if anyone reads this but ummm... if you are reeading this and went to our first show then we love you, if not then you can come see us soon. dates of what i think are 

feb. 18 - fitchburg state college
feb. 20 - i think its in gardner or somehitng
feb. 21 - sorry i know nothin but the dates, im just the bass player, so if you have any question you can im savesthedayoo7    ok ok byebye

SO! my first ever post regarding news about any of the bands i've ever been in! Harvard Division finally has a bassist. Who? Tom. Why? Because he can(we got desperate) but he's good! As of today we have 5 songs, yep 5. I guess we have a show scheduled for January?! I don't know anything about it. Anyone who has the acoustic EP thank you for purchasing that...but, i'm sorry the only song that made it through was..."and the lies continue, my cue to go"...new songs include
Seasonal
Getaway Ohio
the other 2 are still nameless.
umm...i don't have much else to say.

the screen name is Savesthedayoo7 if there are any questions or anything you want to talk about.

Love forever and always,
Shawn ;)

we need a bassist, someone play bass for us, now.

thank you.

hey this is tom, im just write an entry to let ya know whats up. for those of you who dont know us and what we are, well thats what this is for. 

we are a band, thats right. a band. we play music and we have lots of fun... we are currently looking for a bassist and as of this moment we are only a three piece,

shawn- lead vocals and guitar
tom- backing vocals and guitar
chuck- backing vocals and drums

as of now we have 5 songs are are currently working on material, we have an acoustic demo for sale at only 1 dollar so just let us knwo if you want one by either leaving a comment, or you can email me at heros1stmove@earthlink.net ...we should be playing shows late december early January.

-tom
<3
This is Harvard Division's Journal, add us if you want.
